circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Lived alone in an apartment.Did not report to work for several days and the apartment manager was contacted to check on him. They found him dead in bed. Brother listed in New York on medical records but no contact information available.
Homeless male; died at hospice house without notification of next of kin. Unknown NOK

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: The decedent was found deceased in his extended stay hotel room by staff.

Mr. Morgan died of natural causes at Mercy Hospital. He listed a friend as an emergency contact. That friend does not know any family information. An ex-wife was found who also does not know any information on family contacts or location.

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Roberts collapsed on the pedestrian bridge between Omaha, NE, and Council Bluffs, IA.  He was taken to a Council Bluffs, IA, hospital, where he was pronounced.  Roberts ID indicates an Omaha, NE address, and no next of kin information could be found in the residence.  A document from Harlan County Public Schools, KY, was found that verified attendance for a Danny Sergent, DOB 08/04/40, with parent names of Grace and George (last name for parents not provided).  Form was notarized in 2005.  No internet searches have provided results.  Roberts was a registered donor, no information was available in registration for next of kin.  Medical record inquiry provided that Roberts did not list any emergency contacts or next of kin.

In 2003, Mr. Stanton was traveling from California to New York but, for health reasons, was hospitalized in Omaha, NE. An individual through Creighton University contacted a friend whose family managed a nursing home in Earling, IA about possibly taking Mr. Stanton into their care as he was unable to stay at the hospital any longer. He became a resident of Little Flower Haven Nursing Home in Earling, IA on 03/06/2003. Mr. Stanton died on 01/07/2019 and NOK is unknown.
The decedent died at Methodist Hospital in Des Moines after being found unresponsive in his apartment. He was a refugee from Serbia.
